title: Hamilton Beach® Iced Coffee Maker 40912
description:
• Brews delicious iced coffee & tea
• 2 qt. decorative pitcher
• Create delicious iced beverages in under 10 minutes
• Dishwasher safe pitcher with lid fits in the refrigerator
• Recipes included
• Interchangeable coffee and tea filter baskets
• Adjustable strength tea basket brews loose or bagged tea
• Easy to use:
- Fill pitcher with ice
- Add coffee, loose tea, or tea bags
- Fill reservoir with water, then turn on
• Dishwasher safe pitcher with drip-free pouring and refrigerator storage
• Tip-resistant base
